question: Insha allah i will be married to a girl in a few months. I believe i cannot wait that long as my work environmment is so seductive that i am likely to fall into Sin.
answer:
QUESTION

Insha allah i will be married to a girl in a few months. I believe i cannot wait that long as my work environmment is so seductive that i am likely to fall into Sin. i want to kow that if there is any excuse in shariah to perform nikkah with  the same girl twice. The girls parents and my parents will witness the first nikkah and the second nikkah will be witnessed by everyone in my family, followed by the Valima i cannot perform the nikah rightaway a my relatives live abroad and they would gt upset if i get amrried in their absence. moreover i fnd it difficult to control myself.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

If your parent and the girl’s parents agree on the Nikah, then the nikah should be performed. There is no need for a second nikah. The family should be educated on the simplicity and the formalities of nikah.

 

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalamu Alaykum



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
